title: The Resurrectionist : The Lost Work of Dr. Spencer Black
description:

The son of a grave robber, young Dr. Black studies at PhiladelphiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s esteemed Academy of Medicine, where he develops an unconventional hypothesis: What if the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most celebrated mythological beastsÃ¢â‚¬â€mermaids, minotaurs, and satyrsÃ¢â‚¬â€were in fact the evolutionary ancestors of humankind?

The Resurrectionist offers two extraordinary books in one. The first is a biography of Dr. Spencer Black, from a childhood spent exhuming corpses through his medical training, his travels with carnivals, and the mysterious disappearance at the end of his life.
